extendedInfo.description: USA Live TV, the complete solution for mobile TV for Android: ability to watch more than 90 channels of TV from USA, with kind of contents, for you and your Android. Full support for Android mobiles and Honeycomb tablets.NOW ON SALE: only $ 0.99USA Live TV is the online television solution for Android devices. It includes a straightforward and uncomplicated menu from which you access to more than 90 USA TV channels, directly in the application. IMPORTANT INFORMATION:* This application only includes TV channels that officially transmit their contents over the Internet.* This application does not include or will include any pay channel or which does not officially broadcast their contents over the Internet.* Allowances are in each of the respective TV channels and radio stations.* No links to the browser, the application itself plays videos directly.* Not all channels broadcast 24 hours on the Internet.* This application makes no charge for viewing the channels.TIPS:* Only works with Android mobiles and tablets with Flash Player plugin installed. This can be installed for free from the Market.* Some channels may take a while to load. Please be patient, are just a few seconds.* The quality and speed of the video depends on your Internet connection. WIFI is recommended for a better user experience.CURRENT CHANNELS:ABC NewsBloomberg TV	C-SPAN	C-SPAN 2C-SPAN 3CNN NewsUN WebcastKANU TV 99Democracy NowPentagon Channel(New York) - FOX 5(New York) - MNN 1(New York) - MNN 2(New York) - MNN 3(New York) - MNN 4(New York) - WHoH TV(Washington) - FOX 5	(Washington) - City Cable 5(Washington) - TBD TV(Washington) - Seattle Channel 21(California) - TV 30(California) - SFGOVTV(California) - SFGOVTV 2(California) - Altarek TV(California) - City of San Diego	(California) - BAVC 29(California) - BAVC 76(California) - UCTV(California) - PCTV 26(California) - PCTV 28(California) - Central Valley Talk(California) - Cerritos TV3(California) - CBS CW 31(Florida) - TeleMiami(Florida) - FOX 13 Tampa Bay(Florida) - Naples Channel(Florida) - WCOT 13(Florida) - 7News WSVN(Florida) - The Florida Channel WFSU	(Hawaii) - VIEWS 54(Hawaii) - FOCUS 49(Hawaii) - NATV 53	(Hawaii) - OC16 TV	(Hawaii) - OAHU 52(Arizona) - Tucson 12	(Arizona) - MESA 11(Arizona) - Bullhead City TV4(Missouri) - FOX 2 KTVI(Missouri) - FOX 4 WDAF	(Missouri) - KSDK	(Massachusetts) - 7News WHDH	(Massachusetts) - WCCATV(Massachusetts) - Boston City TV	(North Carolina) - FOX 8(North Carolina) - RTN 11	(Ohio) - WOTL 11	(Ohio) - FOX 8 WJW(Texas) - FOX 26	(Texas) - FOX 7 KTBC	(Nebraska) - Lincoln 5 City TV(Nebraska) - Lincoln 21 City TV	(Virginia) - NNN TV 48	(Virginia) - Newport News	(Atlanta) - FOX 5(New Orleans) - WSDU(Albuquerque) - GOV TV	(Nevada) - FOX 5 KVVU	(Michigan) - FOX 2(Pensilvania) - FOX 29	(Utah) - FOX 13 SLC(Tennesse) - News 3 WREG(Colorado) - FOX 31TCN CountryFun Channel AmericaQVCJewelry TVShopNBC	Smile of a Child TVAlmavision	Hope Channel	Calvary Chapel	Catholic TVOscar Aguero Ministry	Legacy TVLLBNCornerStone	DaystarGuideUs TVThe Word Network	TCT TV	Amazing Facts	Global Family NetworkTBN ENlaceHis Channel
